attributes.action: Revise SATs at primary schools. The present structure is demoralising.
attributes.additional_details: Dr. Mary Bousted the General Secretary of the Association of Teachers and Lecturers warned that the implementation time of these tests is unworkable. Also she reports that the content of the curriculum is completely inappropriate for the majority of children.
attributes.background: My granddaughter is considered a bright child and does well at school. During this years SATs she dissolved into tears and told her teacher she couldn't do the test and therefore did not complete it. Despite comfort and reassurance she was left feeling that she had failed miserably.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition which outlines what specific change/revision you would like to take place.
